attributes.action: We the people of the UK demand a General Election.
attributes.additional_details:
Parliament has,had 3 years of discussion,and I'm afraid the speaker has not been impartial,therefore the results of amendments have been 
Skewed unfairly to remainers viewpoint.We feel a General election will change this..
attributes.background:
Remainers in Parliament have
 denied us the result of the democratic referendum VOTE of 2016. Parliament is deadlocked, a General Election will be decisive.
